sentence.Network_en: The letter had a very salutary effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 这封信好似一剂苦口良药。

sentence.Network_en: The team's defeat is a salutary warning before the World Cup.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次失利是在世界杯比赛之前对整个队的一个有益警示.
那植物证明是有益于人体健康的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: salubrious有益健康的salutary有益的，有益健康的optimize使最优化
salubrious有益健康的salutary有益的，有益健康的optimize使最优化
Conducive to good health ; salutary ., 有助于健康的 ; 有益健康的.
Bysalutary a. 有益的,有用的,有益健康的salubrity n. 有益健康

list.abs: one of the most striking and salutary thing in Ameican life is the widespread study of law . ( Alexis de Tocqueville , French judge )美国人生活中最显著而又有益的事情莫过于对法律的广泛研究了。(法国法官托克维尔A)
but businessmen hope his warning will have a salutary effect .然而商人们期望总统的预告将会起到有益的效应。
The accident be a salutary lesson ; I ' ll never drink and drive again ., 这一事故是一个有益的教训 ; 我再也不酒后开车了.
The team ' s defeat is a salutary warning before the World Cup ., 这次失利是在世界杯比赛之前对整个队的一个有益警示.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun in the sense 'remedy'): from French salutaire or Latin salutaris, from salus, salut- 'health'

entry.def: A salutary experience is good for you, even though it may seem difficult or unpleasant at first.

example.ex: It was a salutary experience to be in the minority...
example.tran: 敌众我寡时倒是可以磨炼人。

example.ex: The letter had a very salutary effect.
example.tran: 这封信好似一剂苦口良药。

means.word_mean: 1. tending to promote physical well-being; beneficial to health;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =save,表示"救助"; 2. 完全的，安全的

stems_affixes.word_buile: salut=salv救助+ary……的→救助[身体]的→有益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拯救,救助;救济[者,品],救助工具;救世主
stems_affixes.word_buile: salv救助+ation表名词→n.拯救,救助;救济[者,品],救助工具;救世主
salv救助+er表名词→帮助放东西的盒子等
salv救助+age状态→n.&v.[从灾难中]抢救,海上救助

means.word_mean: (经历)有益的(尽管往往让人不愉快)
